TopicTitle: Last person to post is winner

Articles.Content:
Ways to distract idiots

Look down

look up

Look right look left

So... Hello. You see, at the moment I have to inform you that:

a) You owe me 60,000 USD

Your local police are on their way to arrest you

and c) I am currently winning

a) How much is that in NZD?

What local police?

c) Are you?

a) How much is that in NZD?

What local police?

c) Are you?

a) Expensive

The ones right there

c) No, that would be me
Condom Breaker.

.rekaerB modnoC

Reverse 'Condom Breaker.'
I would like to inform you that I am winning, and any attempt to modify that status will be met at gun-point.

Ok. Tell me where the gun-point is and I\'ll go there. Unfortunately I also get a dying wish: TO WIN THIS GAME!

YOU LOSE!!! Try again!

Please do not worry, I have brought two gun-points for your use.

Here is one:

In addition, any further attempts at winning by any party other than my own will now be met at cannon-point.
I\'ll meet that challenge with a handful (or more likely a nothing-ful) of anti-matter!

Unfortunately, you have attempted to win. I will now fire a cannon-ball at you, thus destroying both the cannon ball and your anti-matter. In the process, the energy released will vaporize you.

At this moment, nuclear weapons have become a viable option for anyone attempting to win.
<jgjiscool throws a black hole at Radion Space Works>

tsk tsk.

<Radion Space Works throws warp drive cores into black hole, flying away at warp speed, while also leaving jgjiscool to be stretched into spaghetti.>
<jgjiscool falls out of the black hole 20 years later and awaits the approach of his enemy>

<Radion Space Works, having already seen how the story ends, exits the black hole and warps away to Earth. Then, he contacts a half-circle of guys in black clothing, asking for assistance to defeat the giant space-spider>

<Radion Space Works, having already seen how the story ends, exits the black hole and warps away to Earth. Then, he contacts a half-circle of guys in black clothing, asking for assistance to defeat the giant space-spider>

<Pair Of Skis eats space-spider>

ATTENTION:

By order of the Federation, further attempts by any party to win besides my own are now going to be met at the gun-point of the USS Enterprise.

ATTENTION:

By order of the Federation, further attempts by any party to win besides my own are now going to be met at the gun-point of the USS Enterprise.

Meh, I can\'t die, so.

Whatever.

Notice:

The Internet Service Providers Union is now cutting internet access to everyone except myself.

Notice:

I\'m winning

Hahaha.

[shadow=grey,left]NO.[/shadow]

Notice:

The word 'no' is now the copyrighted material of Radion Space Works, and subject to international copyright laws. Further use of the copyrighted material will be prosecuted to the highest extent of the law. The words 'I', 'winning', 'win', and 'me' are also under similar copyright.

P.S.: I\'m winning.

P.S.: I\'m winning.

not any more!!!
The above statement is now invalid.
Eat it!!!
I will refrain from eating your offering, as it is more than likely on fire.
